form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION, NARA, 7/18/2023

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/18/2023 68317 CG UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Form Approved IMMIGRATION AND NATURACIZATION SERVICE OMB NO. 43-R0079 as FEE STAMP 54 APPLICATION TO FILE PETITION FOR NATURALIZATION Mail or take to: 06266 827 10-25-84 110% IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE ALIEN REGISTRATION (See INSTRUCTIONS. BE SURE YOU UNDERSTAND EACH Show the exact spelling of your name as it appears on your alien registration receipt card, and the number of your card. If you did not register, so state.) QUESTION BEFORE YOU ANSWER IT. PLEASE PRINT OR Name Gulrajani Hiranand Tolaram TYPE.) No. A20-550-522 Section of Law Date: (Leave Blank) (1) My full true and correct name is Hiranand Tolaram Gulrajani Full true name without abbreviations) (2) I now live at 19500 Victory Reseda Ca 91335 (Number and street, city, county, state, zip code) (3) I was born on 7-13-1913 in Hyderabad Pakistan (Month) (Day) (Year) (City or town) (County, province, or state) (Country) (4) I request that my name be changed to Lalchand Tolaram Gulrajani (5) Other names I have used are: None (Include maiden name) Sex: Male Female (6) My father's name Late Tolaram Gulrajani (7) My mother's maiden name Late Radhibai (8) Was your father or mother ever a United States citizen? No Yes No (If "Yes", explain fully) (9) Can you read and write English? Yes Yes No (10) Can you speak English? Yes Yes No (11) Can you sign your name in English? Yes Yes No (12) My lawful admission for permanent residence was on 11-1-76 under the name of (Month) (Day) (Year) Hiranand T. Gulrajani at Los Angeles Ca 90057 on (City)' (State) (Name of ship, airline or adjustment of status) (13) Since that date I have resided continuously in the United States and continuously in the State of California live since 11-1-76 where I now During the last five years I have been physically present in the United States for a total of 60 months. (14) In what places in the United States have you lived during the last 5 years? List present address FIRST. FROM To STREET ADDRESS CITY AND STATE (a) Dec. 1974 Mar PRESENT TIME 180 816S. Westlake Ave. L.A. Calif. U.S.A. (b) Mar. 1980 April 19. '80 19500 Victory Blvd. Reseda Calif. U.S.A. (c) 19 19 (d) 19 19 (15) (a) Have you been out of the United States since your lawful admission as a permanent resident? Yes No If "Yes" fill in the following information for every absence of less than 6 months, no matter how short it was. NAME OF SHIP, OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH YOU UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES Dec. 15, 77/ July 78, Korean Air Lines Alaska (b) Since your lawful admission, have you been out of the United States for a period of 6 months or longer? Yes No If "No", state "None"; If "Yes", fill in following information for every absence of more than 6 months. NAME OF SHIP OR OF AIRLINE, RAILROAD COMPANY, BUS DATE DEPARTED DATE RETURNED COMPANY, OR OTHER MEANS USED TO RETURN TO THE PLACE OR PORT OF ENTRY THROUGH WHICH YOU UNITED STATES RETURNED TO THE UNITED STATES N/A (16) Do you intend to reside permanently in the United States? Yes No If "No," explain: Form N-400 (Rev. 9-1-78) N REC'D CIT APR 13 1987 (OVER) (1)
